citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
There has been a change in the Attending Veterinarian at this facility as of March 2015. The new Attending
Veterinarian is part-time. There was not a written program of veterinary care available for review.
A written program of veterinary care is required when there is a part-time Attending Veterinarian as required in this
section. This item was corrected prior to end of inspection.
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors
Gladue Paula, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.33(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
There has been a change in the Attending Veterinarian at this facility as of March 2015. The new Attending
Veterinarian is part-time.  There was not a written program of veterinary care available for review.   
A written program of veterinary care is required when there is a part-time Attending Veterinarian as required in this
section. This item was corrected prior to end of inspection.
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors
Gladue Paula, Veterinary Medical Officer
